alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Lower Yampa River Basin; Upper Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 02 at 1:23PM MDT until October 03 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 AM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 expected. * WHERE...Lower Yampa River Basin, Central Yampa River Basin and Upper Yampa River Basin. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 10 AM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Lower Yampa River Basin; Upper Yampa River Basin
